title: [Vornavian Coast, The Lagoon]
description: A canopy of palm trees overhead blocks the view of the moon on this serene section of beach.  The soft sands of the beach provide a comfortable resting place for travelers.  High in the trees, the occasional rustling sound of a restless monkey can be heard as they sleep in their lofts.

A canopy of palm trees overhead provides shade on this serene section of beach.  The soft sands of the beach provide a comfortable resting place for travelers.  High in the trees, monkeys hang lazily from trunks and branches, sunning themselves and napping in their lofts.
